amendment.description: To provide funding for the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1635 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1635 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Alexander to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11323) To provide funding for the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1635 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1635 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Alexander to Amendment SA 1542.
